mapper.sql: ID, NAME, KIND, CREATER, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, USER_ID, IS_USE, IS_OPEN
mapper.select:
select
from T_BSS_PRMS_FIRST_AUDIT_TEMPLAT where IS_USE = 0 and (IS_OPEN = 0
or USER_ID = '${userId}'
)
and NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
and KIND = #{kind}
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

select
from T_BSS_PRMS_FIRST_AUDIT_TEMPLAT where IS_USE = 0
and NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
and KIND = #{kind}
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into T_BSS_PRMS_FIRST_AUDIT_TEMPLAT
ID,
NAME,
KIND,
CREATER,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
USER_ID,
IS_USE,
IS_OPEN,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isUse,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isOpen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update T_BSS_PRMS_FIRST_AUDIT_TEMPLAT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KIND = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_USE = #{isUse,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_OPEN = #{isOpen,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_PRMS_FIRST_AUDIT_TEMPLAT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KIND = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_USE = #{isUse,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_OPEN = #{isOpen,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
